item.content:encoded: Hi Fabio. Nice to know. Thank you for sharing your experience!

item.title: Por: Fabio
item.dc:creator: Fabio
item.description: Hi, I wrote the first post you cited. I deployed my app on the Amazon cloud only because I have the free tier for the first year, but I was thinking of trying Digital Ocean for the future so I think I will save your post for future reference. Thank you!!
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I wrote the first post you cited. I deployed my app on the Amazon cloud only because I have the free tier for the first year, but I was thinking of trying Digital Ocean for the future so I think I will save your post for future reference.
Thank you!!
